column3: As of January 1, 2009, the Company adopted ASC 320-10-65, Investments-Debt and Equity Securities. The Company disclosed comparable information with the prior year in its 2009 periodic reports.

The Diluted EPS calculation for 2009 and 2008 utilizes Basic shares and Income available to common shareholders (Basic) due to the negative Income available to common shareholders. Using actual Diluted shares and Income available to common shareholders (Diluted) would result in anti-dilution.
